DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Trial Oral Testosterone Undecanoate ( TU ) Hypogonadal Men
DOC.criteria: Serum testosterone less equal 300 ng/dL two occasion within one week ( may wash previous oral , topical buccal testosterone therapy ) Significant intercurrent disease type , particular liver , kidney , uncontrolled poorly control heart disease , psychiatric illness Recent history stroke , include transient ischemic attack Untreated , sever obstructive sleep apnea . Hematocrit < 35 % > 48 Serum transaminase > 2 time upper limit normal , serum bilirubin > 2.0 mg/dL serum creatinine > 2.0 mgk/dL BMI > equal 36 Stable dos lipidlowering medication le 3 month Stable dos oral medication diabetes less 2 month Abnormal prostate DRE [ palpable nodule ( ) ] , elevate PSA ( > 4 ng/mL ) , IPSS score > equal 19 point . History breast cancer Use dietary supplement saw palmetto phytoestrogens use dietary supplement may increase serum testosterone within previous 4 week Known malabsorption syndrome and/or current treatment oral lipase inhibitor History abuse alcohol drug substance within previous 2 year Current use antiandrogens , estrogen , oral CYP3A4 inducer inhibitor , longacting opioid analgesic Receipt drug part research study within 30 day initial dose administration study . Blood donation within 12 week period initial study dose .
